gateway is a fully integrated service within AWS and we provide storage natively within our storage services so

service we provide three types of storage just as we have three storage services enable us we provide file
storage through file gateway which gives you file based access to objects stored
in s3 volume gateway provides you block-based storage stored in the cloud
accessible from on-premises integrated with our EBS service for snapshotting and tape gateway which provides you tape
